title: One man's war
creator_credit: Tom Gurr, Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Made to encourage a better understanding of the meaning of the war in Korea. The film conveys impressions of the war as experienced by an Australian infantryman. Photographed on the Australian troopship, in Japan and on the South Korean battlefields.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Gurr, Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
